website_summaries.verdict: An organic, powerful sunscreen with top safety marks from environmental groups.
pros: This reef-safe broad-spectrum sunscreen combines 25% zinc oxide with natural ingredients like coconut oil, beeswax, and calendula flowers
There are only 6 ingredients total, but they provide SPF 50 protection and 81 minutes of water resistance
Safe for face, nose, and ears
cons: Expensive for just 2 ounces of product

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: For all those with much darker skin, this product doesn't leave much of a white cast at all. I recommend you moisturize you skin very well before applying and make sure you don't apply all at once. Put it on in little dabs around the face then rub in well - initially there will be a cast but let it sit for a few minutes and you'll see that it absorbs very well. If there's still a semblance of a cast just keep rubbing. I recommend an oil as a base (argan in my case) for those with dry skin. But it doesn't irritate and I like how much use I know I'm getting out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Tenika B Sam

customer_reviews.title: Small - but Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying these were smaller than I expected. They are perfect for carrying in your purse for on-the-go sunscreen protection. Not so great for covering a family of three at the beach. That said - I used it and it worked. I found this product on a list by Mother Jones of the best sunscreens. I felt good about putting this on my face - it didn't cause clogging or breakouts and I didn't get a burn.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.Phillipps

customer_reviews.title: wonderful sunblock!
customer_reviews.text: Great texture - like a really thick body butter/salve. A little goes a long way - good thing because the container is tiny! Easy to spread so it is great for my toddlers face. Easy to rub in so it becomes clear.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Small container, but it goes a long way. ...
customer_reviews.text: Small container, but it goes a long way. Hard to rub in and takes longer than I'd hoped for white to go away. ( it is zinc after all) It does linger in creases after a work out. Doesn't cause breakouts and doesn't smell.
customer_reviews.author: Deg

customer_reviews.title: Best over-all face sunsceen
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of requirements for a face sun-screen, beyond being safe/natural/organic etc. I have very sensitive skin that needs very strong (50) protection. But my skin gets red/irritated easily (I'm a red-head). So I need it to be gentle/healthy/moisturizing as well. I also really appreciate that it goes on white so I make sure not to miss anything, and then goes invisible. It is smooth but not greasy. I love this stuff It is my 1st purchase from this company, so I plan on exploring it further.
customer_reviews.author: April Dawn

customer_reviews.title: A hit, with a few misses
customer_reviews.text: When i first tried to use this sunscreen, it was really thick and basically crumbled off my face in little dots, because i had a serum on underneath it. I was upset at first but then i decided to try again. I washed the serum off and took a bit of the sunscreen and mixed it with my thinnest moisturizer, and it went on so nicely after that. If you’re going to use this on your face, i definitely recommend you mix it with something to make it spread easier. And pat it it, don't rub it around, or else it might peel off. But overall, i didn't burn, and it doesn't smell too strong so i liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bertot

customer_reviews.title: Good product but very overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a low-waste, unscented sunscreen, and after thinking about it decided to try out these tins. Yes, they’re small, but the product works well. For safety, they’re wrapped in plastic, in case that matters to you. There is no white cast (I have medium olive skin), and while it is a little bit greasy, it doesn’t make me look like an oil slick (I also have combination skin; oily t-zone). Due to its price, I most likely won’t re-purchase unless it goes on sale. Pros: Works well & is low waste. Biggest con: Price for the amount.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Loved the product during my beach vacation!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product was great! I was looking for a product that would offer great sun protection that wouldn’t make my face break out. Previously— I had used normal, run of the mill sun screen— and after a few days of use, my face would be a mess. I decided to give this a try and I was very pleased. I could have probably reapplied more than I did. But I didn’t not burn... and no breakouts! This does go one white... and occasionally makes you look a little discolored— but it’s SUNSCREEN. It’s supposed to protect you from the sun. And it does it’s job. I used this on my face and neck only.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AWESOME. I have combo/acne prone skin and so I’m always a little apprehensive when putting new things on my face, but this sunscreen didn’t break me out at all. I recommend mixing the sunscreen with either your daily moisturizer or face oil to help with spreading the product. I’ve also been using a pea size amount everyday for the past month and I’ve barely made a dent in it!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great low-waste product!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a single tin so I could try out this product. I'm so glad I chose this one over an alternative brand. The tin is nice and compact and the product spreads just like butter! I love the way it makes my skin feel and it never leaves residue. I use a silicone sponge to apply and the amount I need is so insignificant it's hard to imagine it's able to cover my entire face! Will be purchasing again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage, but small product
customer_reviews.text: I like to use this for my face whenever I go out surfing. It stays on my face pretty well for a good couple of hours. I don't have any problem spreading it around since it's more pliable when it comes into contact with warm skin. I do have to say that I'm not sure for the amount you get that it reflects the price. It is pretty small and compact, the size of a pot of lip balm.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: This product works as advertized and comes in a handy and portable tin
customer_reviews.text: I took this sunscreen on a two-week trip to Utah where the UV index warranted the use of sunscreen. I put this product on before going out hiking and kept it in my backpack for re-application. The tin is a perfect size for taking everywhere. I originally bought it for use at the ocean, but with all the negative press about the chemicals in other sunscreens, I'm using it everywhere I need it. It is a great product and I'll definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Janice A. Krinsky

customer_reviews.title: Best natural product that actual protects against the sun!
customer_reviews.text: Always love supporting this company not just because they’re local to us, but the quality of the product is on point. Everything I’ve ever bought from them I LOVE and can’t get enough of their sunscreen the sunscreen butter. The only feedback I would give to other consumers Is that you may need to re-apply more than once an hour if you’re using the regular sunscreen especially if you go into the water being that it’s all naturale. If you’re looking for more protection especially on your face the butter is the way to go over the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Mortimer

customer_reviews.title: Makes your face pretty white but lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: I'm on Accutane so my face burns really easily - bought these months ago and haven't even made a dent in one! Really convenient small containers. Makes your face look pretty white but it does good work
customer_reviews.author: Kira Webster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby!
customer_reviews.text: I got this sunscreen for my baby, because I don’t want to use any chemical sunscreens on him, and it’s been working very well! He hasn’t gotten burnt and it doesn’t irritate his skin.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Good natural sunscreen especially when swimming
customer_reviews.text: I like knowing it is reed safe. Used it in my trip to Italy and swam in the beautiful Mediterranean Sea 🌊. Very dense so I put dots over a specific area, like my arm, before spreading it. It was easier that way and was able to cover all the surface of my skin. My husband and I used it several times and one tin can did the trick! We swam three days, all day, and would reapply after swimming. Pretty thick like a paste texture and I know some people don’t like that. But hey, the corals and other sea creatures do since it doesn’t harm them!
customer_reviews.author: Hazel124

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: First time I used and not happy at all with their his cream. Both my husband and I got sun burnt. We go to the beach early in the morning and leave by 11am so we avoid the strongest UV rays from the sun. We were there for about 3 hours and reapplied cream every hour. This cream is absolutely useless. I would recommend. Would be really happy if could get my money back to buy a product that is really worth.
customer_reviews.author: jose brandt

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Surfing in SriLankan sun early morning so have not tried the effectiveness of sunscreen when it truly counts. However, spreads easy and completely waterproof. Only difficult is getting it off the face (soap and face cream not enough) as do waterproof. Better than getting burnt! Happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: christine meier

customer_reviews.title: It is small and think paste
customer_reviews.text: It is small, it is only 4 inches diameter and half of inch tall ...very little tin It has good cover but definitely only for face because it is thick and hard to apply. I like to keep in my bag for emergencies and for my daughter but I wouldn't buy again since I would prefer something easier to apply.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Environmentally friendly sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: When researching sunscreen for the season, I specifically looked for an effective, environmentally friendly sunscreen in non-plastic packaging. I found it in All Good Organic Sunscreen Butter. I have only used the product once so far, but it protected my skin well. The reason I give this product 4 stars instead of 5 is that the wonderful non-plastic packaging (metal containers) was wrapped in plastic bag for shipping. This goes contrary to the environmentally friendly, non-plastic packaging that I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Julian

customer_reviews.title: Works well, wish it didn't come with the plastic seal
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen goes on easier compared to some others we have used. However it also then comes of a little easier as well so we have to reapply more often. Love that we can use it on the face and lips though! Odorless and tasteless which is how we like our sunscreen. We also chose this looking for a reef friendly sunscreen, in a non plastic container. However, it does come packaged in a round plastic seal. Wish they would forget about that plastic seal and use a paper stick tab instead which would be more reef friendly than the plastic seal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sunscreen brand! Natural and Safe
customer_reviews.text: Love this for our faces! Works great and doesn’t clog pores. If you’re face is already moisturized, it doesn’t leave too much whiteness. Definitely my go to brand in our family for sunscreen (baby to adults)! Also, a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Put this on my face and chest. I got fried like a lobster! It was 71 degrees and over cast I was only out for 3 hours!
customer_reviews.author: moe

customer_reviews.title: It works & I like that the tin fits in my pocket!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a trip to Maui. My friends and I used it on our faces every day and if we happened to miss a spot, that is where we got sunburned. I will most difinitely be buying more when I use these up. Small tins, but a little goes a long way and it is very convenient for carrying in pocket or waist pack.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Huey

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this was not going to work for me simply b/c it was so thick and white..... but, even though it does go on white, it almost immediately turns clear. Thank goodness as I've been looking for a good, simple sunscreen without all the harmful chemicals..... and this seems to be it.
customer_reviews.author: Judie Collins

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sunscreen based on the reviews and was not happy with the performance. I wore it when I was out sightseeing in 90 degree weather and my face started feeling the burn. I had to reapply multiple times to ease the burning sensation on my face. I would not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: PA Royalty

customer_reviews.title: Small but goes a long way, useful, and awesome for all day outings
customer_reviews.text: It is a small little sunscreen but it goes a long way. I can throw it into anything and have. A pocket, bike bag, gym back, waterpack, etc. and have found it most useful for the long days out with very little in toe. It is just so convenient and compact and IT WORKS! It also leaves my skin feeling pretty good which I can not say for many sunscreens.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Hard to spread
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I was looking for a zero waste sunscreen, but it came wrapped in bubble wrap, shrink wrapped, and then in a padded plastic envelope. A lot of packaging for an item that comes in a sturdy tin. The product is thick, hard to spread, and a bit greasier than other sunblocks. I wouldn’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Small size.
customer_reviews.text: I should have read a little more carefully. $20 for 2oz of sunscreen!!! I wasn’t expecting a lip balm sized container, haha. This is enough for 3-4 applications on your face, that’s it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Gambino

customer_reviews.title: Decent sunscreen, way too little product!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice feeling sunscreen. Didnt break out more from initial usage like from some other ones. No terrible ingredients. Unfortunately what arrives in the mail is a much smaller amount than what it looks like when you order it. The amount is about what you expect from a good sized chapstick so its hard to see how youd get more than even a few face uses if youre planning on being dilligent about your sun protection. Very dissapointed by this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great diaper cream!
customer_reviews.text: So I use this unconventionally as a diaper cream for my son. He likes to sit in a poop-filled diaper and not tell us (toddlers). So when his butt ends up raw from that horror show, this stuff does the trick at protecting his sensitive areas and help it heal faster. Works better than any regular butt cream and the ingredients don't make me cringe.
customer_reviews.author: Traci S.

customer_reviews.title: The best sunscreen I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first but this stuff really works! Rubs in easily, doesn’t leave my face shiny or oily, doesn’t make me smell like the pool, and the sun protection lasts for hours. It also doesn’t run into my eyes and cause them to sting when I’m out running or mountain biking. I’m 38 and have had various forms of skin cancer removed almost yearly since I was 25. I’ve tried every sunblock under the sun. This one is my favorite! And BONUS that it’s reef safe. The best sunscreen I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.author: C Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but mighty
customer_reviews.text: I really like this! Great more natural sunscreen, and the little tin has a surprising amount for its size. It will make your skin ever so slightly paler, but after it sets in it goes away, and it doesn't smell nearly as much as other sunscreens. Awesome to keep in your bag, for hikes, etc. Tip: rub it in between your fingers/on your hand to warm it up a bit before spreading, it gets rid of the smaller bits and makes it set in faster in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Bass

customer_reviews.title: We used this in Hawaii. It goes a long ...
customer_reviews.text: We used this in Hawaii. It goes a long way! Yes it goes on white - just takes more time to rub in. Our faces did not burn. We did reapply of course after water exposure. I actually put it all over my body. It’s very convenient to carry. I will definitely buy more for future use.
customer_reviews.author: Sharron Norris

customer_reviews.title: Best Face Sunscreen EVER
customer_reviews.text: Goes on white, but it doesn't aggravate my dry, sensitive skin (rosacea) when I rub it in. Goes on perfectly under makeup. Super happy with this nontoxic holy grail! Will definitely buy again. The tins are TINY, however, so I wouldn't use this for my body- just my face.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value for the money
customer_reviews.text: In my search for items that do not have all the bad ingredients (sulfites, parabens, etc.) I ran across this one. I am pleased all around. A little more rubbing but it absorbs well and quickly. Not too greasy and coverage from the sun seems good.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: The best I could find
customer_reviews.text: Looked at plenty of sunscreens which were chemical and fragrance free, found this to be the best. Using a finger tip amount seems adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Best sunscreen ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sunscreen I have ever used. I have been using it for a few summers now and have never gotten a sunburn while wearing it. I have a condition where a simple sunburn could kill me, so this sunscreen brings me such piece of mind. It does not spread easily, but if you are concerned about your skin, it is worth the extra time it takes to rub in.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I like this stuff. Although at first it’s kinda hard to run in then the whiteness goes away! I would recommend this. I also like it because they are not plastic, but they came in plastic baggies, I didn’t like that
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Leitner

customer_reviews.title: so that was very nice!
customer_reviews.text: It does make your face look a bit whiter when you apply it. I am unsure how much you need to apply for the product to work. I am allergic to many sunscreens and did not have a reaction to this one, so that was very nice!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Baby safe and good for the environment
customer_reviews.text: Bought this sunscreen for my 17 month old son because I wanted organic and environmentally friendly. This sunscreen works really well, is easy to spread, and the compact tin makes it easy and convenient to carry!
customer_reviews.author: sarahbug63

customer_reviews.title: love this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried this and the other in the tube for sunscreen. I prefer this one, if I want to get a tan. This product does not burn me, and it is easy to spread. It is time consuming to spread, like the other product, it's worth it if you don't want all the chemicals in your product. This one doesn't seem to have an odor like the other one in the tube. I like the fact that it's easy to carry in my purse or bag or whatever I have wherever I'm going in case I need it; I will continue to use it.☺🏊👙💛
customer_reviews.author: keeniekiss

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Moisturises and protects my hands -- and easy to keep in pocket or purse, so it's always handy. Brilliant product!!
customer_reviews.author: California

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing that it is 50SPF
customer_reviews.text: it covers well. It's pure and natural ! It has moisture , But I add moisturizer as I have dry skin . The zinc has a very sheer white finish , but dissipates . It's amazing that it is 50SPF. Don't need much to cover face ! Recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Plastic-free packaging
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a coral-safe sunscreen that didn't come in a plastic container. Other than the small plastic safety seal and amazon's plastic box-filler, I found what I was looking for. It requires a little more effort to get it rubbed in than a lotion would, but the white zinc does almost disappear. I spend a lot of time outdoors by the water as a marine naturalist. It's nice to have a small tin with me that's easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Thorly D James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife, who is very particular, really raves about this product. Bit expensive, though.
customer_reviews.author: Chucho

customer_reviews.title: Great produce.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Doesn't apply easily, but stays on! I only use it on faces. Don't store in cooler, it becomes to hard to apply. I use it on my children first then apply an easier to apply sunscreen every hour and a half after. The small tub last a lot longer than you would think.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Sherer

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Loved this, it worked really well on a recent trip to Hawaii. I think I will continue to be something I always buy. Goes on like a tub moisturizer consistancy, chalkiness disappears on skin in a minute or two as it settles in.
customer_reviews.author: john gold

customer_reviews.title: Great sunscreen and super waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product- you put it on once and you hardly ever need to reapply it even when spending time in the water. It does not feel greasy, it is not full of chemicals, and I don't think I've ever gotten a sunburn or even suntan when using it.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: So gently (but chalky)
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully gentle. Be prepared for a thick white caste on skin that takes a while to settle in (but never completely). Still though for the beach to have this little handy treat is so nice! I will be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: TKPics616

customer_reviews.title: Great :)
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Easy to spread. I always put it on after my moisturizer soaks into my skin. I just rub my index finger on it and spread it on my face before I know I'm gonna go out. Living in miami, it's good to know I have something to protect my face
customer_reviews.author: Andrea C.

customer_reviews.title: Best sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: It takes a little time to rub in, but it does the job and is safe for your skin and the environment. One little bottle lasts forever! And I use it every day!
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: It works just fine I wear make up over though because it’s a little on the white side when you apply it
customer_reviews.author: Shanin T.

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff - Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for applying on my nose before I apply lotion and makeup. I know it’s there and will stay. The white color does fade if you apply all over. Great product. Love the extra protection.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Good for swimming only
customer_reviews.text: Great if you are in water. Hard to apply, very thick. Good for small exposed areas. Have to scrub it off, can clog facial pores.
customer_reviews.author: 1952boomer

customer_reviews.title: Works as described. Just note that it shows as ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Just note that it shows as a light white film as all the other 50+ zinc sunscreens.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, very compact! Came dented though so I can’t open it :(
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this product, but sadly one of them came dented and I’m unable to get it open! I was busy using the first one and didn’t get to see this til now but I can’t get it open since it’s a screw on type. Otherwise it’s a wonderful product! I think I just got a defective one meh!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Good, needs better seal
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was in more of a sealed container so it could be put in my make up pouch in my purse. I’m afraid it will detach lid & get messy. Otherwise, excellent smell & great product.
customer_reviews.author: MOMOFJAKE

customer_reviews.title: Great travel size
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I like the small packaging, I can take it hiking & biking. It doesn't turn to liquid in the heat and it bends clear on lighter skin.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but a bit expensive for the volume you receive.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be good quality, but it is rather on the expensive side considering the amount of sunscreen product you receive and how quickly it is used up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy. Thank you
customer_reviews.text: I have very light sensitive skin and allergies to a large number of skin products made for sensitive skin. I was very enlightened to find out that I can use this sun screen without problems. I'm very happy. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware....tiny container!
customer_reviews.text: I fell for the photo looking like a much larger container. It's not only little, it's TINY.
customer_reviews.author: George H.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that works without the added chemicals. It's a "good" product for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Good facial sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Smaller container than what I was expecting, but when only using it on your face you don't need a big tin. This stuff works great! Have not gotten burned and a little goes a long way. Does leave a very slight white tint if you apply too much, so go easy.
customer_reviews.author: emilee

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: When you are exercising strenuously for long periods outdoors, this is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Kindle JD

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get them open. Defective.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a package of 2 and they were both in a plastic bag. They were slightly leaking but I don’t know how due to the fact that I could not get them open!! Even my husband couldn’t get the top off so I wasted my money! Very upset. They were obviously defective.
customer_reviews.author: Lori B.

customer_reviews.title: Clean product that spreads easily
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, but found that it isnt waterproof enough. I use it on my face and lips, and was really hoping this would keep my lips from burning, but it doesnt last in the ocean.
customer_reviews.author: Aerie Waters

customer_reviews.title: Gives great coverage, but still leaves a small white cast ...
customer_reviews.text: Gives great coverage, but still leaves a small white cast on my face unless I rub it in a lot. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Best sun protection for the face I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best sun protection for the face I have ever used. Been out on the water all day for several days and fully protected with this awesome butter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my fourth time buying this. Carries well. High concentration of zinc oxide. Natural ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Piper W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: smells amazing! and its convenient to carry in a bag with you, and to travel its perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Nyah

customer_reviews.title: Best sunscreen out there!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for our baby because of minimal ingredients, we loved it so much that the entire family is using it now.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Too obvious!
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen gives your face a clear white paste-ish look and doesn't really absorb in. Especially noticeable if you apply this over moisturizer. Would only use it if you don't mind making it obvious that you have sunscreen on - for ex. at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek Bhagat

customer_reviews.title: Easy wear/Great protection
customer_reviews.text: Goes on and stays on, while washing off easily - all while providing the best sun protection - this product is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: FLpaddler

customer_reviews.title: Success
customer_reviews.text: The sunscreen butter went on very smooth. There was plenty in the tin for both my children to use for a long weekend at the beach (reapplying regularly). It did sting when it got in my daughter's eyes, but really most sunscreens do. We will purchase this product again!
customer_reviews.author: ACB

customer_reviews.title: What a mess!
customer_reviews.text: White chalky meds which is exactly what it said it wasn’t! Don’t buy this! Does not go on clear! Plus I got too much sun on my face with it on!
customer_reviews.author: Tralena J Walker

customer_reviews.title: Not so easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I like the ingredients but it makes the sun screen not easy to spread
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Smells fine, goes on smooth
customer_reviews.text: Save your skin and the coral. Smells fine, goes on smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Very small container!
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure this product is great. I haven’t used it yet but I wanted to post this pic of the size of the tin. I didn’t read the details (my bad) but was surprised to see how small it is for the price! Haha!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to support this item as it is plastic-free. But the tin boxes are basically sample size, way smaller than what is shown in the photos.
customer_reviews.author: mell

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: I like that it doesn't feel awful like other sunscreen!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Stays put and easy to spread
customer_reviews.text: This sunblock works extremely well, I thought it would be a little bigger. But, it goes a long way. I have been recommending it to everyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Segerstrom

customer_reviews.title: all good is everything good
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a product that protects the environment. Allgood's products are suitable for this purpose and have good quality. Thank you for making a great product
customer_reviews.author: Kiwook Lee

customer_reviews.title: I feel protected!
customer_reviews.text: I have Melasma/ hyperpigmentation and the zinc oxide in this SPF adds to extra protection and repair. Thank you All Good!
customer_reviews.author: Sujoya Jacob Sakaria

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Recommended to me by a cosmetologist. I think it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Kent

customer_reviews.title: Caused a rash under my eyes
customer_reviews.text: Good sun protection and reef friendly, but after 5 or 6 applications, I developed a rash under my eyes. I changed to a Banana Boat Product and it cleared up within a couple of days..
customer_reviews.author: Randy Hilbig

customer_reviews.title: Only a few ingredients and super clean ingredient list
customer_reviews.text: This product is super small for the price and I feel I can only use it sparingly and on small areas like face and shoulders. This product is not practical for long term use or full body use.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice consistency and not much of a scent. Definitely gives a bit of a white zinc look.
customer_reviews.author: L. Herrick

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea behind this product and the container is perfect. Way better than those squeeze bottles. I’ve only used a little bit of it so far but it spread on easy and didn’t leave my skin feeling greasy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not complete order
customer_reviews.text: Have yet to use it but bought the 2 pack and only one came in. Will update review when I actually use product. Used product and worked pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny DOrsi

customer_reviews.title: So far I have not gotten a sun burn so I’m satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it’s comfortable to carry and pretty easy to apply. Make sure to spread it out properly.
customer_reviews.author: Oriana M

customer_reviews.title: It does a great job to protect my skin while I play in ...
customer_reviews.text: The local product! It does a great job to protect my skin while I play in the ocean, nice consistency. I wish I had it as a stick. Thanks for being environment-friendly!
customer_reviews.author: Elena Ufimtseva

customer_reviews.title: Best protection ever.
customer_reviews.text: Last a lot longer than I thought it would. Pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Hudson Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Pleasant consistency and has not caused acne ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Pleasant consistency and has not caused acne breakouts. Remains white unless rubbed in well due to high zinc concentration.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaves white residue but it's good
customer_reviews.text: Leaves an insane white residue but knowing it's not toxic will make me buy it again. My bf has pale skin and he burnt pretty bad, altho it's prob our fault since we didn't apply it when we should've. As for me, in my darker skin, I'm completely satisfied with the product. I have the prettiest bronze color and zero burn.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Travel size, be aware
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed, The images referencing the. “Actual size” is deceiving and not worth $20.99 !!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynsey

customer_reviews.title: Probably not enough for your body
customer_reviews.text: Just received today. Haven’t used it yet but will update. Just letting you all know. It’s really small. Size of a US dollar coin. Probably enough for your face but not your body
customer_reviews.author: Peter Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Good for your skin and for the fishies
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Bought it for summer trips. Goes on white but turns clear. Perfect for plane travel, and REEF SAFE!!
customer_reviews.author: sylviad

customer_reviews.title: excellent product! this is a must for children and ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent product! this is a must for children and bare scalps. truly rubs in clear. extraordinary sun protection
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Lasts longer than you think it will in such a small jar. A tiny bit went a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Scott

product_meta.title: All Good Mineral Butter SPF 50+ (1 oz)(2-Pack)
feature_bullets: ONLY 6 INGREDIENTS - Made with only 6 simple ingredients plus zinc oxide, this Sunscreen Butter formula was designed for extreme environments like high elevation or water sports. Goes on white, but rubs in clear. Very water resistant
WATER RESISTANT - 80 minute water resistant. Ideal for face, nose, ears, and more.
CONVENIENT - Tin fits easily in pocket or purse
EWG Top Rated Safest Sunscreen - UVA/UVB Broad Spectrum Protection
OXYBENZONE FREE | GMO FREE | GLUTEN FREE | VEGETARIAN | NON-NANO | BIODEGRADABLE CORAL REEF FRIENDLY
